page.title: 19Wildridings Estate Bracknell
page.content: This{housing estate}was built by the Development Corporation in the 1960's as part of the{Bracknell New Town.} Wildridings has one shopping centre, a junior school and infant school and two public fields with play apparatus. The area is pleasantly landscaped and maintained by the council.The estate roads are all cul-de-sacs,preventing the passage of heavy and dangerous{ {traffic.} Every house has a private garden, central heating,two indoor toilets,a garage and at least three bedrooms. The old{Mill Pond}has been enlarged to provide a public pleasure amenity with boating,fishing,crazy golf, tea-rooms and a public house. { Downside Centre}caters for young disabled people and{Heathlands}looks after the elderly.The oldest person is Mrs.Faulkener,who is 106 years old.
